SmartVac 3000: A revolutionary vacuum cleaner that utilizes AI technology to optimize cleaning routes, detect dirt, and adjust suction power accordingly. It can also recognize and avoid obstacles, ensuring a seamless cleaning experience.

AirMate: A vacuum cleaner that doubles as an air purifier, using advanced HEPA filters to remove allergens, dust, and other harmful particles from the air. It also features a built-in UV-C light to sanitize surfaces and eliminate germs.

BotVac: A robotic vacuum cleaner that can navigate and clean your home on its own, using advanced mapping technology to avoid obstacles and optimize cleaning routes. It also features voice control and can be scheduled to clean at specific times.

AquaClean: A vacuum cleaner that uses water instead of dirt to clean surfaces, effectively eliminating dirt and grime without leaving any residue. It also features a built-in water tank and can be used to clean hard-to-reach areas like baseboards and corners.

EcoClean: A vacuum cleaner that runs on eco-friendly, rechargeable batteries and features a built-in charging station, making it easy to keep it powered up and ready to use at all times. It also has a compact design that makes it easy to store and transport.
